text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein

text: The greatest wealth is health.
author: Virgil

text: Your body is a temple, but only if you treat it as one.
author: Astrid Alauda

text: Take care of your body. It’s the only place you have to live.
author: Jim Rohn

text: Health is not just about what you’re eating. It’s also about what you’re thinking and saying.
author: Unknown

text: To enjoy the glow of good health, you must exercise.
author: Gene Tunney

text: Happiness is the highest form of health.
author: Dalai Lama

text: The body achieves what the mind believes.
author: Anonymous

text: Good health and good sense are two of life’s greatest blessings.
author: Publilius Syrus

text: He who has health has hope; and he who has hope, has everything.
author: Arabian Proverb

text: The human body is the best picture of the human soul.
author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

text: Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food.
author: Hippocrates

text: It is health that is real wealth and not pieces of gold and silver.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: Health is a state of complete harmony of the body, mind, and spirit.
author: B.K.S. Iyengar

text: Your health is an investment, not an expense.
The best doctors give the least medicine.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: A healthy outside starts from the inside.
author: Robert Urich

text: Your diet is a bank account. Good food choices are good investments.
author: Bethenny Frankel

text: An apple a day keeps the doctor away.
author: Proverb

text: You can’t enjoy wealth if you’re not in good health.
author: Unknown

text: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
author: John Muir

text: Health is a relationship between you and your body.
author: Terri Guillemets

text: Healthy citizens are the greatest asset any country can have.
author: Winston Churchill

text: Your health is your greatest wealth.
author: Unknown

text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

text: A healthy mind does not speak ill of others.
Happiness is the highest form of health.
author: Dalai Lama

text: To keep the body in good health is a duty, otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear.
author: Buddha

text: Take care of your body; it’s the only place you have to live.
author: Jim Rohn

text: The best wealth is health.
author: Virgil

text: Wellness is the natural state of my body.
author: Unknown

text: Every human being is the author of their own health or disease.
author: Buddha

text: If you don’t take care of your body, where are you going to live?
The groundwork for all happiness is good health.
author: Leigh Hunt
